title: Robust quantum computational advantage with programmable 3050-photon Gaussian boson sampling
notes: Large-scale GBS demonstration; important for empirical loss and scaling benchmarks.

title: Efficient Classical Sampling from Gaussian Boson Sampling Distributions on Unweighted Graphs
notes: Classical algorithmic baselines that can challenge some GBS instances.

title: Input phase noise in Gaussian Boson Sampling
notes: Noise robustness analysis for GBS; relevant for realistic simulations.

title: Fast simulations of continuous-variable circuits using the coherent state decomposition
notes: Simulation method for CV circuits to scale larger models.

title: Continuous-Variable Multiplexed Quantum Repeater Networks
notes: Architecture for CV repeaters and multiplexing strategies.

title: Noise-reduction of multimode GBS circuits via Unitary Averaging
notes: Practical mitigation strategies for multimode GBS.

title: Integrated Photonic Quantum Computing: From Silicon to Lithium Niobate
notes: Recent hardware trends and integration platforms; useful for realistic modeling.

title: LiDMaS: Architecture-Level Modeling of Fault-Tolerant Magic-State Injection in GKP Photonic Qubits
notes: GKP magic-state preparation strategies for fault-tolerant photonic QC.
